content: Don't worry about it, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>. I'll keep an eye on the soil quality for you. {A灵光一现}If it degrades... I'll figure somethin' out!

content: Hi <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>! {A疑惑}Yeee? You're holdin' a shovel... Whatcha plantin', mah? Mind if I take a look? I just wanna watch.
